discussion.p: When V does not model sized_range, take_view::begin returns counted_iterator(ranges::begin(base_), count_). Since the counted_iterator constructor () already has a precondition that n >= 0, we should add this to take_view as well, which is consistent with drop_view.
Set status to Tentatively Ready after eight votes in favour during reflector poll.
discussion.note: 2022-11-12 Approved at November 2022 meeting in Kona. Status changed: Voting → WP.

blockquote.p: -1- Effects: Initializes base_ with std::move(base) and count_ with count.
